# nexus-progress-bar



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property        | Attribute       | Description                                                                | Type      | Default |
| --------------- | --------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ------- |
| `circle`        | `circle`        | Indicates if the progress indicator should be a circle instead of a bar.   | `boolean` | `false` |
| `error`         | `error`         | Indicates if the progress bar should present its error state.              | `boolean` | `false` |
| `indeterminate` | `indeterminate` | Indicates if progress value should be ignored and the value indeterminate. | `boolean` | `false` |
| `value`         | `value`         | Sets the current progress percentage out of 100 for the bar.               | `number`  | `0`     |


----------------------------------------------
